name: NullplatformAsset
description: Azure Devops task for asset management on Nullplatform
helpMarkDown: Azure Devops task for asset management on Nullplatform
author: pablo.ilundain@nullplatform.io

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: asset action
inputs.helpMarkDown: The asset action controls what happens to the asset. Can be one of: create, update

inputs.name: buildId
inputs.label: build id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The build id where this asset belongs to

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: asset type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Asset type, could be docker-image, lambda, etc

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: Predefined asset URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Predefined asset URL. This is an advanced usage and is not recommended, use *type* and *name* instead

outputVariables.name: buildId
outputVariables.description: The build id associated to the asset

outputVariables.name: name
outputVariables.description: The asset name. Identifies an asset to deploy

outputVariables.name: type
outputVariables.description: The asset type. Could be docker-image, lambda, etc.

outputVariables.name: targets
outputVariables.description: The asset targets. This is an array containing a collection of urls by provider where the asset must be uploaded

outputVariables.name: metadata
outputVariables.description: The asset associated metadata. This is a key-value object
